title: Siren
description: One-click this new mythological romance today! Lorelei has been trapped alone on an island for over twenty years, her siren powers muted, taken from her by a jealous god. When an old ally and occasional enemy comes to Lorelei for help, sheâ€™s given a deal in exchange for her freedom and powers returned. With the help of four Navy SEALs, Lorelei gathers old friends and contacts, building an army to take on the god who imprisoned her. As their quest brings them through dangers and intrigue, Lorelei has to decide if she's ready to trust herself and the four men who have quickly come to mean the world to her or if she's better off alone back on her island. This is a reverse harem romance, which means the leading lady doesn't have to choose between love interests. This is a fast-burn, standalone romance. There is MM content in this novel.
author: Helene Gadot
